name: Cranapple Cinnamon Sweet Dip Mix (Hex)
summary: If you could package the holiday season in a jar, this would be it! With tart cranberry, sweet apples, warming cinnamon, and a touch of hibiscus, take this seasoning way beyond dip to elevate your holiday baked goods, morning smoothies and waffles, and charcuterie boards. Itâ€™s oh-so-good and will be the talk of the holiday season!
